amendment.description: Amendment makes a number of technical and conforming corrections.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 111-327 to amend the Amendment in the Nature of a Substitute for H.R. 2868 to make a number of technical corrections and fix typos and verbiage issues.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thompson (MS) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 168 (Roll no. 869).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Thompson (MS).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thompson (MS) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 168 (Roll no. 869).
